definition:
actions:
- deploy:
    images:
      kernel: {image_arg: '-kernel {kernel}', url: 'KERNEL_IMG'}
      rootfs: {image_arg: '-drive format=raw,if=virtio,file={rootfs}', url: 'ROOTFS_IMG'}
    os: debian
    root_partition: 1
    timeout: {minutes: 5}
    to: tmpfs
- boot:
    auto_login: {login_prompt: 'login:', username: root}
    media: tmpfs
    method: qemu
    prompts: ['[a-zA-Z0-9\-\_]+@[a-zA-Z0-9\-\_]+:.*?#']
    timeout: {minutes: 2}
- test:
    definitions:
    - from: inline
      name: env-dut-inline
      path: inline/env-dut.yaml
      repository:
        metadata: {description: Basic system test command for Linaro Ubuntu images,
          format: Lava-Test Test Definition 1.0, name: smoke-tests-basic}
        run:
          steps: [printenv]
    - from: git
      name: smoke-tests-net
      params: {USE_NC: 1}
      path: lava-test-shell/smoke-tests-net.yaml
      repository: http://git.linaro.org/lava-team/lava-functional-tests.git
    timeout: {minutes: 5}
context:
  arch: amd64
  extra_options: [--append "root=/dev/vda rw highres=off console=ttyS0 mem=256M"]
device_type: qemu
job_name: qemu-amd64-wrlinux
metadata: {job.original: 'http://example.com/scheduler/job/1'}
priority: medium
timeouts:
  action: {minutes: 2}
  job: {minutes: 10}
visibility: public
